html: Razor. Or cut off with scissors all the hair, as was done with lepers, (Leviticus xiv. 9.) and Levites, Numbers viii. 7. The country shall be pillaged, and all shall be in mourning. (Calmet)— The men shall be despised as no better than women and cowards. (St. Jerome) (Theodoret)— Hired. With large sums. (Calmet)
